item.title: The Loft
item.description: The Loft is the jewel in the crown of the Bushcamp and offers open plan living at its finest. An abundance of ocean views combined with elegant comfort has resulted in a truly unique apartment that is fast becoming popular as a honeymoon destination or special occasion getawayâ€¦
